title: Drawing, ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite, brush and wash on paper
markings: In purple ink, upper right: Cooper Union stamp: MUSEUM / FOR THE / ARTS OF / DECORATION / COOPER UNION (Lugt 457c); watermark: F L
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Right half; a triangle with a Nike holding in her outer hand a bar with a trophy, and in her inner hand a wreath. The outlines of the arch and of the case, and the keystone are sketched. Inscribed in black chalk: “fama del arco”.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, ca. 1805.Pen and black ink, graphite, brush and wash on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1357.
